attributes.action: Prevent businesses from relying on automated letters in legal proceedings when the business cannot demonstrate a reversal mechanism when incorrect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many have rec'd automated letters which are churned out by the thousand even after the individuals have contacted the organisation to inform them of the error and told to ignore the letter - to later find the organisation refering to the very same letters on further automated communications relating to legal matters.
